category.name: Integration.CATIA

preference.name: CATIA_savemanager_dynamiccrosshighlight_option
preference.preference_description: Toggle on/off the Dynamic Cross Highlight button in the Save Manager panel. Possible values: - TRUE = "Dynamic Cross Highlight" option is ON. - FALSE = "Dynamic Cross Highlight" option is OFF.
